solution_line_template: Checking each possibility, we can see that dividing each pizza into {slices_option1} slices yields {num_pizzas}*{slices_option1} = {total_slices_option1} total slices, dividing each pizza into {slices_option2} slices yields {num_pizzas}*{slices_option2} = {total_slices_option2} total slices, and dividing each pizza into {slices_option3} slices yields {num_pizzas}*{slices_option3} = {total_slices_option3} total slices.

The only option that satisfies this requirement is dividing the pizza into {slices_option2} slices, as {total_slices_option2}/{num_children} = {slices_per_child_option2} slices per child. Therefore, the mother should divide each pizza into {slices_option2} slices.
